alert.note: Alert for Eastern Tucker (West Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pittsburgh (Western Pennsylvania and East Central Ohio)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 28 at 12:26PM EST until January 29 at 1:00AM EST by NWS Pittsburgh
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 AM EST SATURDAY... ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 1 AM SATURDAY TO 9 AM EST SUNDAY... * WHAT...For the Wind Chill Advisory, very cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 20 below zero. For the Winter Weather Advisory, snow. Additional snow accumulations between 2 and 4 inches. * WHERE...Eastern Tucker County. * WHEN...For the Wind Chill Advisory, from 1 AM Saturday to 9 AM EST Sunday. For the Winter Weather Advisory, until 1 AM EST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the Friday evening commute. The dangerously cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes.
info.instruction: Use caution while traveling outside. Wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves. Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
